OOC: OK, got her all set.  Her name's Empath - needless to say her 
trademark ability is reading and influencing minds.  She's a 
Decepticon Seeker reformatted to a Predacon.  She kept the jet mode 
and gained the ability to turn herself into a rifle-like weapon 
useable by other transformers - which may bring back memories for 
Galvie if he recollects his life as the original Megatron.  Now she's 
gained a beast form to boot.  (I'm telling you this now because 
Galvie should know about his subordinates.)

BIC: One stasis pod activates, going through the usual song-and-dance 
before opening to release a sleek jaguar.  The feline glances around, 
uncertain for a moment of her surroundings.  Seeing Galvatron, she 
sits on her haunches and speaks in her usual cooing voice (with an 
underlying purr now added): "Lord Galvatron; a pleasure to see you, 
as always.  Forgive my ignorance, but where are we?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> OOC:alright then
